DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This randomize study . Patients randomize receive succimer addition standard treatment ( arm I ) standard treatment ( arm II ) . Succimer administer orally 3 time day 7 day , twice daily 19 day . Patients may receive 3 course . Standard treatment consist medical history physical examination , environmental assessment modification reduce lead exposure , dietary modification decrease lead absorption , use daily multivitamin mineral supplement iron , developmental screening intervention , frequent follow lead level . If blood lead level rise 45 mcg/dL , patient receives succimer regardless treatment arm originally assign . Patients follow every 3-4 week 2 month , every 3 month 6 month , every 6 month thereafter .
